entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Good Hope Airport 11:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -25

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and overnight. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
